name: @certusone/wormhole-sdk-proto-node
description: NodeJS client protobuf for interacting with Wormhole

scripts.build-deps: cd ../.. && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --target node-export -f Dockerfile.proto -o type=local,dest=. .
scripts.build-all: npm run build-deps && npm run build-lib

author: certusone
